summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 2, 3, 4, 43, 44, 45, 46, 47 and 48 in Block 11, Hillman City Addition to the City of Seattle, Division No. 6, excepting those portions already taken for City of Seattle streets and further excepting those portions already zoned-Business (Area District "C"); with respect to Use Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended by adding thereto one new section numbered 2-358.
